channel.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
channel.description:
So for the last three days I've been taking people to school on the Noob School Bus (for my entertainment, and for the sake of their education). It's a pretty sweet ride if you ask me: [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/2655/tshirtmbusblackart280.gif[/img]
Anyway, on to the pics. Stat pic for anyone interested: [img]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/2618/statsandgreets.png[/img]
No loot, but still downed him. [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/4119/1000a1000.png[/img]
Lousy loot. [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/5802/billyb0b144.png[/img]
Wasn't a bad fight, he just didn't make it out alive. :P [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/9987/cr4ven1.png[/img]
This one was actually on a PvP world (not Bounty Hunter). I just went here to see how populated Edgeville was: [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8655/ericfrank.png[/img]
Short-changed again. [img]http://img377.imageshack.us/img377/8152/funmatrix123.png[/img]
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/3408/jack6776.png[/img]
This one was interesting. I actually had the guy as a target, and we fought. He got killed while trying to run out, but I didn't get the loot. As fate would have it you don't lose them as a target if you don't get the loot. :P This pic is of is second death. The guy was running his mouth right up until the moment he dropped, so I'm glad I schooled him. [img]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/5484/karilsrage1.png[/img]
[img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/8179/killelliot.png[/img]
Sorry for the lack of a loot pile picture. I did have one, but the context menu hid his name, so I took this one to replace it. [img]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/1350/madxx2.png[/img]
Another kill that I didn't get the loot for. Doctor Rambo was nice enough to give me the pots/vambs though. :) [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2517/ranginghero4.png[/img]
Now this guy is probably the coolest person I've actually ran into on a Bounty Hunter world, just by virtue of not being an excuse-inventing jerk-off. We had three fights (believe it or not he's 7 combat levels lower than me and actually asked for all of them; I suppose you can afford fun challenges like that though when you have all of the loot from reaching 99 slayer :P). This is the first one. [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/4835/saetanic.png[/img]
And here's the third one. Sorry, forgot to screenshot the second one. :( [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/3676/saetanic2.png[/img]
[img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/176/soulzrangez.png[/img]
Quite a good drop in this one. :) [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/8509/venozman1.png[/img]
Another reasonable drop: [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/4797/xgmaul.png[/img]
So yeah, that's it for the time being. I'll amend this topic when I get another 10 - 20 kills.

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:38, topic:298428”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=394826.msg2940797#msg2940797 date=1251860382]
40 80 1 with 80 range is perfectly balanced and would probably go really well. Pretty good start so far though.
[/quote]

I thought now that without defence nub pures suck?[/quote]
40 80 1 is right around the 56 combat mark, IIRC. Most of the players in f2p BH worlds at that level are pure.

Read full topic

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Your pics made me try out bounty hunter.
It took me about 10 minutes to buy supplies etc.
I walked to edgeville and logged out.
I logged back in on a bounty world, I died within 2 minutes (my first fight, had like 15 swordfish before I died).
Fail.

Read full topic

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:31, topic:298428”]The joy of killing someone is there regardless of the loot!

So how many times did you die compared to the times you killed? Nice kills there![/quote]
Good question. KD ratio was probably around between 2:1 and 3:1.

Read full topic

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:24, topic:298428”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=394826.msg2938494#msg2938494 date=1251712300]

Rune isn’t that much though, I’d try going for those new items they added.

It’s f2p. Take a look at the pictures.
[/quote]I know it’s F2P, but still a few rune items aren’t that much

Are we talking about the per-kill value of my kills, or the total value of all kills posted?
In either case I’m satisfied, and I doubt I’ll do much better on a per-kill basis.

I’m actually considering 99 defence at the moment, just so the account is more pro.
There’s no way in the world that people will fight me on f2p once I do that, though. :P[/quote]All kills probably have a good value total’d up but some of those kills are useless.

Read full topic
item.source: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“atrox_, post:28, topic:298428”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=394826.msg2938745#msg2938745 date=1251731712]

Highscores

i meant in game
[/quote]
theres the lunar spell ‘Stat Spy’[/quote]
That’s p2p only, but the reality is that a lot of players use Swiftswitch (or whatever it’s called now), so they have the ability to look people up quite quickly and easily without changing screens.

The bottom line is that they don’t need to look me up most of the time anyway; there’s a big difference in the amount of hits taken when you compare 70 defence to 90 defence.
It’s extremely obvious to them when they find themselves redbarred while I’m still well above the half hp mark, and even more obvious when I drain their supply of food while only eating half a dozen times myself.

Read full topic

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:23, topic:298428”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=394826.msg2937158#msg2937158 date=1251625982]

Rune isn’t that much though, I’d try going for those new items they added.

It’s f2p. Take a look at the pictures.
[/quote]I know it’s F2P, but still a few rune items aren’t that much :P[/quote]
Are we talking about the per-kill value of my kills, or the total value of all kills posted?
In either case I’m satisfied, and I doubt I’ll do much better on a per-kill basis.

I’m actually considering 99 defence at the moment, just so the account is more pro.
There’s no way in the world that people will fight me on f2p once I do that, though.

Read full topic

item.title: My Bounty Hunter kill pics (Just a warning, there are numerous large images)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

atrox_:

Why F2P/61 Prayer?

Fair question. The account was initially made for luring on p2p but the wilderness was removed.
I was never a fan of the number 52, so I took it up to 60. I ended up getting 61 by burying dragon bones on KBD trips.

Read full topic
